website_summaries.verdict: The Boston Acoustics TVee One natural-sounding upgrade to your current TV's sound that costs considerably less than its competitors.
pros: The Boston Acoustics TVee One sits under your TV and offers natural sound with both music and movies
There's built-in Bluetooth connection for wireless audio streaming
And the speaker's lightweight and simple design makes it easy to install
cons: There's no built-in subwoofer, nor the ability to add one later, so action movies aren't as impactful as they are via its rivals
Its lightweight design make it feel less sturdy than its competitors
The front panel display is indecipherable
And the remote's squishy buttons are annoying

customer_reviews.title: Very Solid Performance
customer_reviews.text: THERE IS ALMOST NO BASS. Now, if bottom-end is more important than loud, clean sound, look elsewhere. I do love a pounding movie soundtrack, and enjoy my main home theater system. I don't need that in my bedroom setup. I just wanted something to elevate the audio, without blowing me out of the room during action scenes. This has a great night listening mode, which I keep it on. The most surprising aspect is how loud the volume can go, producing a very well-simulated surround effect throughout our average-sized bedroom. I bought one through Warehouse Deals used, and I believe $130-$150 is a fair price. $200+ is pushing it, especially since, there's no subwoofer out to add an extra kick.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound
customer_reviews.text: Music on my Pandora radio station is really nice. The newer movies also sound a lot better. Hear sounds in background that I never noticed before. You can sometimes even hear sound of engine in some of the Star Trek movies. Nice also on some of the older movies where in the past, I could not understand the actors, especially some of the British actors. Only gave it a 4 because I was having trouble with the remote. After about a week I ordered a new battery and that took care of it.
customer_reviews.author: Hairy Harry

customer_reviews.title: What a perennially broken piece of JUNK!
customer_reviews.text: It's a very simple device. There are only like 4 buttons. Setup is simple. The sound & price are both fantastic. So why one star? This garbage has been broken for more time than it's been functional. It's already been shipped to Boston Acoustics for one repair & it's about to go in for another. Keep in mind this lives in a country house & has probably seen 20 hours of use in the past 18 months. Also keep in mind it spent about half that time in a box. Super disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Danrogy

customer_reviews.title: Great TV Sound w/o a surround sound system
customer_reviews.text: Just awesome and amazing! I have an expensive 50" Mitsubishi Surround Sound television.....but I have never been happy with the overall sound. It was great for sports and music, but horrid for regular TV shows, Mitsubishi said the problem was with DirecTV.....DirecTV couldn't figure it out. Our of desperation, I went to an outside sound system....shutting off the audio on my Mitsubishi. RESULTS: !00% perfect sound. My DirecTV remote controls volume and off/on.....The TVOne provides excellent sound in all formats and all sound levels. It saved my TV. For TV sound it is GREAT. 100% recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Stephy

customer_reviews.title: It broke after one month, but I will try another one
customer_reviews.text: This broke after 32 days usage. The on/off button on both the remote and the speaker base itself do not work anymore. And the volume decided itself to go to maximum loudness with the volume "down" button useless on both remote and speaker base. The only way to turn it off was to unplug the thing. It is being returned for another unit. One more chance, Boston Acoustics. Received a replacement unit on Dec. 9, and it worked fine - until Jan. 24, when the replacement unit broke. Beware of buying these things!!!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great performance and quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is *EXACTLY* what I was looking for as a complement to my flatscreen. I had been shopping around for an inexpensive solution (compared to Bose, for example) that could give me a better sound compared to the out-of-the-box capabilities my TV has. And this device has filled in the gap quite nicely. I had acquired a Boston Acoustics radio in the past and the value I've gotten from it (cost/performance and again, compared to a Bose Wave) has been amazing. This experience drove me to look into this sound plate when I was looking for one. I browsed and I got it from Amazon for $180 as an open-box of sorts. Definitely worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: cgsolano

customer_reviews.title: Lasted two weeks
customer_reviews.text: This was a nice-sounding unit while it lasted, but two weeks after I hooked it up, it stopped working. It powers on, but that's all. I didn't open it right after it was delivered, so by the time it failed I was outside the return window. Yes, it's under warranty, but Boston Acoustics has only two authorized service centers--neither of which is anywhere near Boston. I ended up buying a Sony HTXT1 2.1, which seems fine so far--fingers crossed.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: TVone experience rated
customer_reviews.text: I am 76 years old, with some hearing deficiencies. I do not have a hearing aid, nor do I want one. The TVee One Speaker Base allows me to be able to hear audio frequencies that were eluding me with the television built in speakers. A very satisfactory fix. F.H.
customer_reviews.author: Floyd B. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: This worked for exactly 6 months and then died. I called the company and they said I would have to pay out of pocket to ship it to one of their 2 service facilities in the US (NY or CA), but that they would then fix it for free. This is unacceptable to me as a good company should cover ALL costs of their warranty when their own product fails. I should have paid better attention to the many other reviewers who had similar experiences and bought a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: TOMANDLISAT

customer_reviews.title: Great for apartment dwellers
customer_reviews.text: This a solid TV Speaker if you live in small to midsize apartment and you do not want a full blown surround sound system. Pro: TVee model about $100 less than the Bose Solo TVee model has Bluetooth the Bose solo does not, same for a few other brands. Sound is good quality not great but its 4 star quality out of 5. Cons: TVee one does have several sound "listing" modes but I cant really tell much different between them. Night mode is almost non existent and not worth messing with. Needs a mode for no base mute. I live in an apartment and nobody likes loud bass at midnight from my PS3 games.
customer_reviews.author: JAD

customer_reviews.title: Loved the ease of set up and sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: Huge difference in sound quality from t.v. alone. We have this hooked to a t.v./dvd combo and there is a world of difference. We especially love streaming Pandora/Spotify through the unit via Bluetooth. Extremely easy set-up. Also has a day and night setting so if people are sleeping in a nearby room while you are using the system, you can still use the unit but the range of the music/movie is dampened. We are very satisfied. One caveat...this set-up is in a small room in our home. I do not know how it would handle a larger space.
customer_reviews.author: FLDad

customer_reviews.title: Seller will not help you when the unit breaks, after 8 months no longer stays on.
customer_reviews.text: Worked ok, until it didn't anymore. Seller unwilling to help, asked that I reach out to the manufacturer who said that I did not buy from an authorized reseller. Unit worked for less than 8 Months before no longer staying on for longer than a couple seconds and cutting out. It's not a boat anchor with zero support from the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Meccanica

customer_reviews.title: An AWESOME purchase on Amazon Prime Day...that I would purchase at full price again without hesitation!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough here....I purchased this on Amazon Prime Day for one heck of a good deal...but after using it for a few months I can confidently say I would purchase at full price without hesitation!! Boston Acoustics offers such clear, crisp sound...and is worth investing in! Upgrade to a Boston Acoustics and you'll stick with them from now on!
customer_reviews.author: lilbitmalicious

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great improvement over the built-in speakers on my TV. However, the sound quality is not what I expect from Boston Acoustics. The mid to high frequencies seem muffled, especially as low volumes. Wonder if someone has tried the Boston Acoustics TVee One as well as the Bose Solo 15 and the Denon DHT-T110 TV Speaker Base and could comment on the difference in sound quality among these products.
customer_reviews.author: Atul

customer_reviews.title: Awesome TV audio solution! Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding solution. My wife and I can now hear every word. Sound is accurate and clear. If you're looking for home theater that shakes the house and irritates the neighbors move on. But if you you are looking for clean and accurate sound with great dynamic range buy this thing. Boston acoustics has been building quality audio forever. We love this small solution with a two cable hookup.
customer_reviews.author: Rascal

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed because I spent the extra money thinking I was ...
customer_reviews.text: Had it just long enough (34 days) when it quit working and couldn't return to Amazon. Called Boston Acoustics and they said I had to send it to authorized service center for repair. Not holding on to much hope that it will be returned anytime soon. Disappointed because I spent the extra money thinking I was getting quality, I had bought a cheaper ZVOX 220 for another TV, wish now I had just bought two of those. Update....Sent unit to United Radio for warranty repair (they had to replace main circuit board). They repaired and had it back to me in a week, still uneasy about the TVee One but truly impressed with United Radio of New York
customer_reviews.author: M Gintz

customer_reviews.title: Great, but remote is iffy, at best.
customer_reviews.text: I love the rich, deep sound of the unit considering the size and price, but the remote drives me mad. It works when it wants to. I get that I can program my other remotes to control the unit, but that is just for volume. You cannot program sound/equalizer settings that only the dedicated remote can control. Maybe I just need to contact Boston Acoustics for a replacement remote. Other than that, the sound is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Angel L. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great Equipment, great sound.
customer_reviews.text: I once had a pair of Boston Acoustics speakers for an older PC, and I tried so hard to find a way to hook them to my modern TV. They sounded unbelievable so I had some knowledge to what these guys could do. I'm hear to say this is an amazing product. Compares very well to what most probably consider higher end products, would recommend to anyone on the fence.
customer_reviews.author: BrianO

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for the bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Good sound for the bedroom. I hook this up to a Roku TV and play Xbox on it mostly. The sound quality is a nice upgrade to the TV speakers, but if you need deep thumping bass, get a subwoofer. I don't like the remote, so I programmed the Roku TV remote to control the volume.
customer_reviews.author: A. Wong

customer_reviews.title: A great deal for a great product!
customer_reviews.text: At half the usual price at Amazon, this was a deal I couldn't walk away from. And unless Ke my Bose speaker base, it has Bluetooth so I can play music through my iPhone and iPad mini. Not quite as powerful as the Bose but a great improvement over the TV speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Obie B. Nevels

customer_reviews.title: Nice Compromise to full Surround Sound System
customer_reviews.text: Puts out ample sound through low, mid and high ranges and definitely vastly improves audio on TV set. Looks great placed under the 42" flatscreen. Negatives: bluetooth connection to iPad falls off constantly so we use the cord provided to prevent that when streaming music through the speaker. Control settings to universal remote also need to be reset often and don't seem to work consistently. Remote furnished with speaker also functions inconsistently. Solid solution for a smaller or open loft space.
customer_reviews.author: Kate B

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sounding Speaker Box
customer_reviews.text: Definitely improved the should over the TV speakers for regular broadcasts. The stronger part of the system is the sound quality of music. It has a fuller sound and has enough bass without thumping the neighbors. I was happy with the price and delivery. Would recommend. The supplied remote is not the best but we converted the cable remote and it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: mta

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. The hardest part was lifting my TV to put it underneath. Perfect size to fit under my 40" Samsung and the riser it sits under. The sound is amazing. I wish it had a bit more bass, but I suspect I would need a separate sub-woofer for that. The only thing that would make this product better would be a sub-woofer output. I would be willing to pay more for that option...
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Boston Acoustics TVee One
customer_reviews.text: Boston Acoustics TVee One. I've been using it for over a year now and it works just as described. It is connected with the optical audio cable and controlled with the Time Warner Cable remote control. The sound is alot better than the tv speakers, whether it is movies, music, dialog, etc.
customer_reviews.author: abc.123

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product. Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Easy to install. I am hearing sounds I never heard before and was missing with my prior TV only set up. There are no speakers all over the place and no need for a monster woofer. The price was reasonable and I would highly recommend the TVee One.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie D

customer_reviews.title: Superv Value for Money
customer_reviews.text: This makes such a difference. The sound quality is excellent and does throw the sound to the extent that if there's a knock on the door from the TV, the dogs now run to our front door. Great bass quality and the sound settings are so easy to change to suit what you're watching. It's so nice to be able to watch movies loud and be able to hear all the dialogue. Highly recommended! It also supports our 72" flat screen with no problem, so don't be put off by the max size TV quoted.
customer_reviews.author: 'Dougie' Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Great Alternative To Surround Sound
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is excellent. Great improvement over flat screen TV sound. Installation is simple and instructions offer several variations to adapt to each system's requirements. Previous reviews were extremely helpful in making this buying decision. It's not surround sound, but that is not what I was looking for. This is an excellent, inexpensive alternative that provides really good sound with Bluetooth options for other media in addition to TV.
customer_reviews.author: Don Sutherland

customer_reviews.title: great sound box for the money
customer_reviews.text: great sound box for the money. kind of big though for a sound bar, wouldn't really call it a sound "bar" more like a sound box! check the size. our 60" didn't fit on top of it. had to get a new TV stand with the suspension bar on the back
customer_reviews.author: robleighj

customer_reviews.title: Boston Acoustics
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound. Sleak design and modest size. Would be great alone, but I opted to also add a Yamaha subwoofer for a little additional bass on occasion (also purchased on Amazon).
customer_reviews.author: Paul R

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I compared this one and bose solo 15. and choose it because this one cheaper and has bluetooth. This one satisfies my needs and very convient. Sound quality is good especially when you connected with PS4
customer_reviews.author: Mark Yang

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I don't use it as a base but as a speaker only. It has very good sound. The only improvement would be a model with a wireless sub-woofer. The space available didn't accommodate a product with a wireless... Still 5 stars for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Rick L

customer_reviews.title: The bluetooth is a nice feature but when you use it with your Ipod ...
customer_reviews.text: The remote that came with it doesn't seem to work. Sound is okay, no big base. The bluetooth is a nice feature but when you use it with your Ipod or tablet, be sure to lower the volume when you turn on your television.
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Easy install and good instructions to program my remote
customer_reviews.text: Easy install and good instructions to program my remote. Lack of bass makes it little better than the TV's internal speakers. Works best at high volumes, which my wife disapproves of.
customer_reviews.author: Steve S.

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, great price, no down side.
customer_reviews.text: Get this. It's great. only word of advice is to NOT connect your TV remote volume to it if you can't turn off your TV speakers. Otherwise, this is a great sounding product, minimal footprint, and looks bad ass on my console.
customer_reviews.author: The McGuires

customer_reviews.title: Better than what I had...
customer_reviews.text: I have heard better (5.1 surround sound) but this fills our needs fine enough. The more I listen to it, I can hear the distinct difference between the TV's audio and this upgrade. Granted, I have to crank up the volume a bit to enjoy it, fully.
customer_reviews.author: Ty Kauhi

customer_reviews.title: Not Good!
customer_reviews.text: Went through two of these. The second one broke also. If you have multiple devices that use bluetooth in your house, the soundbar gets confused and won't play the sound from television. Probably why it has been discontinued. Would not buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: NORA E.

customer_reviews.title: Thankyou Boston Acoustics
customer_reviews.text: My husband is very hard of hearing and this seemed to do the job. Hookup was simple and very clearly written .
customer_reviews.author: Diane Thums

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Looked at the Bose but it didn't have Bluetooth. Bought this instead and I love it. Sounds great. Bluetooth works well. Very happy with purchase. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Cape Codder

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very useful and great sounding - would and want to buy another for our other TV.
customer_reviews.author: bearfilm

customer_reviews.title: Boston Acoustics TVee
customer_reviews.text: This speaker base fits nicely under by 55 inch tv. Very easy to set up and program. It practically does it itself. The sound quality in my opinion is very good. More than enough volume for a large family room. Get it. You won't be disappointed. Recommended highly. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Boston beats Bose!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Bose Solo speaker base at Costco and could not help but feel ripped off for what I received. Minimal sound improvement, no features and an empty wallet. When I found this speaker I though I would give it a shot. It was half the price and it offers blutooth. I'm so happy I did! Not only does this system sound better than the Bose Solo, it turns off and on with your TV! It learns your remote control and offers Blutooth! Don't pay more for the Bose Solo! This offers way more for less.
customer_reviews.author: P. Francis

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as advertised
customer_reviews.text: After a couple of months it has crapped out and does not take commands, Boston Acoustics is very difficult to reach for help with a damaged or problemed unit
customer_reviews.author: Golfbuddy

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Husband did research and found this one. Works great for out tv. We have a small living room and it gives clear sound without overpowering.
customer_reviews.author: michele

customer_reviews.title: Just what I Wanted
customer_reviews.text: This unit was easy to install and works seamlessly with the TV. Just power ip the TV and the sound bar is on. It has good quality of sound without being to overpowering. I would recommend this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Bear Claw

customer_reviews.title: Boston  Acoustics TV Base
customer_reviews.text: I had problems hearing my flat screen TV. The Boston Acoustics TV speaker base ended that problem. Now I can watch TV and not have the sound turned up so loud it bothers everyone else in the room. It does the job and looks good too. Larry
customer_reviews.author: Larry Hall

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, but not that awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed this sound system. Compact, easy to use and great sound. The bass was a little less than I was hoping for but with most things in life there's always a considerable amount of disappointment...bluetooth worked fine, liked the minimal features, easy to use and nice how you can program the system to function with your existing cable/tv remote....I would give this 5 stars but I no longer own this as my ex took it upon herself to keep it even though I paid for it. so I'm sorry to you the potential consumer for this. Not for the break up but for people's blacken hearts in general. otherwise 5 stars all the way
customer_reviews.author: decay603

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to setup. It learned my remote quickly, so I have one remote in my house. The sound quality is great for tv and even better for music.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Divine

customer_reviews.title: very clear the quality is excellent only reason why I'm giving it 4 stars is ...
customer_reviews.text: very clear the quality is excellent only reason why I'm giving it 4 stars is because the base is terrible almost feel like I need to buy a subwoofer
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: The first of these products I've purchased.
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to set-up. Came as advertised and meets or exceeds my expectations. I was considering the Bose Solo. I have had other Bose products before but, this is a better value for my money.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Hasten

customer_reviews.title: Hear what you've been missing.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and pair with existing remote. MUCH improved sound for my flat screen system. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound addition to any TV
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound addition to any TV. It makes watching TV a whole new experience. Awesome clear crisp sound. Easy to set up and program. A terrific investment for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Guarino

customer_reviews.title: Good Product.
customer_reviews.text: Product works fine. Not as good as a larger theater package. Battery for remote was dead and optical cable stopped functioning the 2nd day. The accessories need to be replaced by manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Eric G.

customer_reviews.title: I finally replaced it with something that works great for 26% of what I paid for this paper ...
customer_reviews.text: It never worked right. I only bought it because of Boston Acoustics name. What a mistake. I finally replaced it with something that works great for 26% of what I paid for this paper weight.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall Frankel

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great for the price but have never had a true ...
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great for the price but have never had a true surround system to compare it to. Good looking sound base that 46 inch flat screen sits on perfectly. The remote is not very responsive when adjusting sound. But crank it up and it sounds very good. Love it for youtube videos. Scares the the ____ out of the dog.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy F Westfall

customer_reviews.title: TV Speaker Base
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work great only had a few days but easy install
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Boston Acoustics TVee One Speaker Base
customer_reviews.text: Boston Acoustics TVee One Speaker Base unit performed extremely well when connected wirelessly or thru when connected directly thru HDMI.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Hoemke

customer_reviews.title: It's great.
customer_reviews.text: System has too much bass sound in all selections for our taste. Other than that, It's great.
customer_reviews.author: Conrad W. Ware

customer_reviews.title: great shipping, product was as described
customer_reviews.text: prefect, just what i needed.great shipping, product was as described.
customer_reviews.author: Brucea58

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my decision !
customer_reviews.text: Had speaker base for a few months now and only problem was battery was dead in remote when I got it. Looks great and sounds good for it size. Not as good as big subwoofer but a lot less clutter and turning itself on with tv is a great feature
customer_reviews.author: martin j przywara

customer_reviews.title: Great sound system
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up. The sound is clearly an improvement over the TV alone. It turns on with the tv, very convenient. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Geniecyclist

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Distorted bass, and poorly designed in terms of human engineering.
customer_reviews.author: J MITCHEL

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful TV sound at last!
customer_reviews.text: Makes a huge difference in TV sound. Simple to install. Fits perfectly underneath our 42" TV pedestal.
customer_reviews.author: DMBoardman

customer_reviews.title: Less than Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I've had the unit for 5 months. The original remote was defective and didn't work at all. BA was very easy to work with, and they mailed me a new one quickly. The unit's been unreliable the entire time I've owned it. Sometimes it would come on. Sometimes it wouldn't. A few days ago it finally died entirely. No lights, no nothing. Again I called BA. The warranty process is that I have to ship the unit to NY, at my expense, where it will be repaired and then returned to me at their expense. For a defect that wasn't my fault I still have to spend my time and my money to get it rectified.
customer_reviews.author: ECP

customer_reviews.title: Everything is fine except....
customer_reviews.text: The remote battery was dead, had to spend $4 for a new battery. The remote is a little slow to respond, other than that, the speaker sounds good + Bluetooth is a nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel Jarata

customer_reviews.title: Great sound bar
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sound bar it learns your favorite remote and it sounds great would recommend to any one
customer_reviews.author: plas

customer_reviews.title: Real good unit -- well worth the money for our '43 ...
customer_reviews.text: Real good unit -- well worth the money for our '43 inch TV in our small den area -- more than enough sound. Can't compare to Bose, but can compare price - about a third... :-))
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo T.

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY, IT'S A WASTE OF MONEY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this speaker b/c Boston usually has good products @ least I thought. exactly 35 days after having speaking they are making weird loud crackling noises. What sucks is I can't even return it for an exchange or refund b/c my 30 day limit is up. This speaker sucks I would not recommend any one buy this unless you want to waste your money. Boston Acoustics and Amazon need a better return/exchange policy especially for electronic items . This a huge scam to me works good for a short while then sound is very crappy,crackling and in and out. UGGGGGGHHHH SO frustrated with this item, Money down the drain :(
customer_reviews.author: Steven Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Last less than 2 months :-(
customer_reviews.text: Bought it on July 16, 2015 and stopped working on September 3, 2015. Really disappointed. :-(
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Valentin

customer_reviews.title: B. A. unit had frequent audio dropouts with ...
customer_reviews.text: B.A. unit had frequent audio dropouts with popping noises regardless of which input was selected - I returned it - got the Energy Power Base and it works with no problems and improves TV speaker sound!
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. Great imaging. Unfortunately the remote doesn't work. Yes, I put batteries in. But it is synced with my TV remote and my iPhone Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sounds amazing, good price, easy to set up, remote and user interface are brain dead (minus one star)
customer_reviews.author: Hyperjack

customer_reviews.title: Boston Doesn't Disappoint!!!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker base is great for the size and sounds very crisp and clear and works in big or small rooms. The sound channels though the back of the speaker which sounds great for movies or music for low or high bass and treble notes. I also have an xbox and play games at loud volume and this speaker does not disappoint you can hear every detail from shooting, to someone walking up behind you. This speaker was a good fit for my 32 LCD TV. I recommend this product for anyone who wants amazing sound for less space usage.
customer_reviews.author: jakethesnake1995

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: It's worth every penny! Very happy with sound and the ease of use. Great for any home with an open concept!
customer_reviews.author: Jans Wayne Hestdalen

customer_reviews.title: Great sound but the remote it came with did not work
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and bass but the remote has never worked. We tried putting a new battery in the remote and it still did not work.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: A great buy with impressive sound quality for smaller rooms
customer_reviews.text: Other than some minor volume issues it has been a great buy. It is very user friendly and adds realism to the sound in bed rooms and smaller rooms where a full blown system would be over kill. It plays best for me in the spatial setting which creates a simulated sound field. Sounds the best when playing Blue Ray DVD's. Bass is surprisingly strong too. Syncs well with all my remotes too.
customer_reviews.author: Ken camello

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup and nice sound for both music and movies.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey R Scott

customer_reviews.title: This was the BEST money I have spent in a long
customer_reviews.text: This was the BEST money I have spent in a long, long time. Very pleased. Wish I had found this sooner!!!!
customer_reviews.author: John Vos

customer_reviews.title: Huge improvement over TV's sound
customer_reviews.text: The TVee One makes a huge improvement over the sound of our Samsung LCD TV. Speech is much easier to distinguish, and overall sound is much fuller.
customer_reviews.author: David Sauer

customer_reviews.title: Boston Acoustic is better than advertised!!!
customer_reviews.text: The sounds was terrific as compared to the new Samsung Led tv. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: David Cole

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my son was looking for as a Christmas gift!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Fenton

customer_reviews.title: Boston acoustics or Bose solo?
customer_reviews.text: A buddy bought the Bose solo and after hearing it and comparing it to my little soundbar, it was time to upgrade. Did some research and all I have to say is, this thing has awesome sound! Comparing it to my buddies bose solo, I would have to say that if there is a difference, I'm not hearing it . Especially for the difference in price. Has very good sound and I will say that the dialogue mode on this is better than it 8 on the Bose solo.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Remote does not work. The remote that I pair ...
customer_reviews.text: Remote does not work.The remote that I pair does not lower the volume onlyrises it.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Torres

customer_reviews.title: Way less money than a Bose.
customer_reviews.text: When the pellet stove is on I need this product. It does however go off when certain lamps are turned or but it happens randomly. It also stops working and I need to get up and activate once of the buttons. Not very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: HLA

customer_reviews.title: jack
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my 50" sharp tv. It amplifies and expands the sound using the various settings for voice, music, movies and games. The Bluetooth setting is great too.
customer_reviews.author: John F. Mceachern

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Sound Stand!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a Vizio sound bar, like night and day between the two. The Boston was everything I expected and more. Great sound, great bass. Did not know what I missing until I got this hooked up. The install was quick and easy, the only tricky part was the remote and getting my current remote to read properly. This is set up for IR reading only I believe, so it actually reads the remotes signal not a code. A little tricky but got it working in about 20 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Boston Acoustic Tvee sound box
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is great and clear, can hear from the other side of the house. However, there is hardly any surround, hence only a sound box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon frequent buyer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: If your TV speakers work fairly well, don't bother- does not begin to replace surround systems.
customer_reviews.author: Landisj

customer_reviews.title: Bass reverberates like a boom box. Awful.
customer_reviews.text: There is no way to adjust the bass and treble. Unless you like boom box bass rhat goes right through you and reveberates off the walls, I do not recommend this. While Boston Acoustics techs are friendly and try to be helpful -- even calling back several times -- they have no fix for this problem other than to ask their engineers to fix it in the next model. We are returning it to Amazon and have replaced it with a ZVOX 555 that has better sound plus bass and treble controls.
customer_reviews.author: Bev Conover

customer_reviews.title: Just not BA quality
customer_reviews.text: Dead on arrival, unfortunately. Nowhere near the build quality of previous BA purchases I have made either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor sound, questionable reliability
customer_reviews.text: Bass is uncontrollably boomy on all settings. The remote no longer works (may just be the battery, but why would that fail in three months?), I can work the controls on the panel, but some of those don't respond either). I haven't contacted customer service yet, may revise my review if they can come thru.
customer_reviews.author: effnut

customer_reviews.title: not great. powers on automatically with the rest of my ...
customer_reviews.text: ok, not great. powers on automatically with the rest of my gear, then looses connection with the tv. has to be manually power-cycled. bought a new rocketfish optical cable and that didn't help. disappointed in both function and quality of sound.
customer_reviews.author: t2unes

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: Got it, loved it, and then it stopped taking commands within 24 hours of unpacking it. So disappointed and such a pain to have to pack it up and mail it back! Very disappointed in Boston Acoustics customer service. They are useless.
customer_reviews.author: North Sloper

customer_reviews.title: nice product
customer_reviews.text: easy to install, not theater sound but great for a quick and easy sound improvement over TV speakers. I bought two.
customer_reviews.author: bdranch

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for us
customer_reviews.text: Could never get it to work properly with our Sharp flatscreen TV. With the TV operating in the analog mode, unit worked but tone control could not be adjusted. In digital mode through the cable box, only half of the unit operated and sound quality was not good. Gave up and returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Doren E. Curtiss

customer_reviews.title: could not get the static out of music
customer_reviews.text: It works great for tv...I really wanted to listen to my music through it...Pandora...but it gets "static" and sounds like it's popping and sometimes like fireworks...They sent me a new one and it did the same thing...so back it went for a 2nd time....nobody seems to know why....
customer_reviews.author: jan

customer_reviews.title: Improves sound but hard to control the output. When ...
customer_reviews.text: Improves sound but hard to control the output. When watching a movie the suspenseful parts, the music or other sound effect get extremely louder. So you are having to constantly adjust the volume.
customer_reviews.author: Al L.

customer_reviews.title: Seller did not include instructions, battery in remote was ...
customer_reviews.text: Seller did not include instructions, battery in remote was dead and seller was non responsive! Buy new and save yourself the aggravation.
customer_reviews.author: laurie

customer_reviews.title: Useless piece of brick
customer_reviews.text: Received the item today. Does not power on. Now I have to deal with returning this brick. AVOID .poor quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Boston Acoustics TVee One TV Speaker Base with Bluetooth (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
product_meta.description:
The Boston Acoustics TVee One is an under TV speaker system that dramatically improves your listening experience. It fits perfectly under most TVs up to 50", connects to your TV with a single cable and provides room filling sound for your favorite television programs and movies. It even streams music wirelessly from your Bluetooth mobile phone, tablet or PC for those times when you want to sit back and listen to music. Elegantly styled to integrate into your home without taking over your space, the TVee One is a great alternative to a traditional sound bar.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


The TVee One from Boston Acoustics is an under-TV sound system that dramatically improves your television watching experience by providing exceptional sound quality for today's thin TVs. Experience clear dialog and room-filling sound while watching your favorite television shows and movies. This slim speaker fits under most TVs up to 50 inches and connects with a single cable. It is Bluetooth enabled for wireless music streaming, and can even learn your TV's remote control commands. Elegantly styled and simple to use, the TVee One is a great alternative to a traditional soundbar.

TVEE ONE TELEVISION SPEAKER BASE
 * Slim speaker sits under TV and holds TVs up to 60 pounds
 * Stream music wirelessly from mobile devices with Bluetooth
 * Dolby Digital and Digitally Optimized Virtual Surround for realistic surround sound
 * Two tweeters and two woofers for exceptional room filling sound

Click each image to enlarge.COMPACT SYSTEM CREATES IMMERSIVE SURROUND SOUND
The TVee One features a two-way stereo system with two 2- by 5-inch woofers and two 1/2-inch tweeters for deep lows and crisp highs. Boston's Digitally Optimized Virtual Surround (DOVS) uses Dolby Digital decoding to create a realistic cinema-like surround sound experience. And BassTrac technology, a circuit that controls and maximizes bass output, delivers clear and balanced bass at any volume.

EASY SETUP AND OPERATION
The TVee One connects directly to your TV with a single cable. Optical, coax, and analog inputs with automatic selection allow you to easily connect any TV. The TVee One can also learn your television's remote control commands, so you won't have to add yet another remote to the coffee table.

BLUETOOTH ENABLED FOR WIRELESS STREAMING
Thanks to TVee One's built-in Bluetooth technology with aptX, you can stream music wirelessly from your smartphone, tablet, laptop, or other Bluetooth-enabled device and enjoy all your favorite songs in full surround sound.

FIVE LISTENING MODES AND NIGHTMODE
With your choice of five listening modes, the TVee One lets you customize the sound quality and level to your room, TV show, or listening preference. NightMode reduces fluctuations in sound, so you don't have to keep adjusting the volume, ideal when family members are sleeping nearby.

PRODUCT MEASUREMENTS
The TVee One can accommodate large televisions up to 60 pounds, including most 50-inch flatscreen TVs. It measures 2.63 by 23.56 by 14.0 (H x W x D) and weighs 9 pounds.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
Boston Acoustics TVee One, optical digital cable, analog cable, manual, quick start guide and remote control.
feature_bullets: The TVee one can accommodate large televisions up to 60 pounds, including most 50 inch flat screen TVs

High performance, 2 way stereo speaker base with 1/2 inch tweeters, 2x5 inches woofers and acoustic ports on the back panel; The system provides a wide range of sound, with deep bass, clear high frequencies and exceptional dialog reproduction
Bluetooth streaming with aptX; Enjoy CD quality wireless music streaming from aptX equipped Bluetooth devices
Dolby Digital decoding with Boston's Digitally Optimized Virtual Surround (DOVS) for realistic surround sound
The voltage is 120v and intended for use within the US
